00016 #ifndef BT_OBB_BOX_2D_SHAPE_H
00017 #define BT_OBB_BOX_2D_SHAPE_H

00019 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btPolyhedralConvexShape.h"
00020 #include "BulletCollision/CollisionShapes/btCollisionMargin.h"
00021 #include "BulletCollision/BroadphaseCollision/btBroadphaseProxy.h"

00026 ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) btBox2dShape: public btPolyhedralConvexShape
00027 {
00028 
00029         //btVector3     m_boxHalfExtents1; //use m_implicitShapeDimensions instead
00030 
00031         btVector3 m_centroid;
00032         btVector3 m_vertices[4];
00033         btVector3 m_normals[4];
00034 
00035 public:
00036 
00037         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00038 
00039         btVector3 getHalfExtentsWithMargin() const
00040         {
00041                 btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00042                 btVector3 margin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00043                 halfExtents += margin;
00044                 return halfExtents;
00045         }
00046         
00047         const btVector3& getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin() const
00048         {
00049                 return m_implicitShapeDimensions;//changed in Bullet 2.63: assume the scaling and margin are included
00050         }
00051         
00052 
00053         virtual btVector3       localGetSupportingVertex(const btVector3& vec) const
00054         {
00055                 btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00056                 btVector3 margin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00057                 halfExtents += margin;
00058                 
00059                 return btVector3(btFsels(vec.x(), halfExtents.x(), -halfExtents.x()),
00060                         btFsels(vec.y(), halfExtents.y(), -halfExtents.y()),
00061                         btFsels(vec.z(), halfExtents.z(), -halfExtents.z()));
00062         }
00063 
00064         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE  btVector3    localGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3& vec)const
00065         {
00066                 const btVector3& halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00067                 
00068                 return btVector3(btFsels(vec.x(), halfExtents.x(), -halfExtents.x()),
00069                         btFsels(vec.y(), halfExtents.y(), -halfExtents.y()),
00070                         btFsels(vec.z(), halfExtents.z(), -halfExtents.z()));
00071         }
00072 
00073         virtual void    batchedUnitVectorGetSupportingVertexWithoutMargin(const btVector3* vectors,btVector3* supportVerticesOut,int numVectors) const
00074         {
00075                 const btVector3& halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00076         
00077                 for (int i=0;i<numVectors;i++)
00078                 {
00079                         const btVector3& vec = vectors[i];
00080                         supportVerticesOut[i].setValue(btFsels(vec.x(), halfExtents.x(), -halfExtents.x()),
00081                                 btFsels(vec.y(), halfExtents.y(), -halfExtents.y()),
00082                                 btFsels(vec.z(), halfExtents.z(), -halfExtents.z())); 
00083                 }
00084 
00085         }
00086 
00087 
00089         btBox2dShape( const btVector3& boxHalfExtents) 
00090                 : btPolyhedralConvexShape(),
00091                 m_centroid(0,0,0)
00092         {
00093                 m_vertices[0].setValue(-boxHalfExtents.getX(),-boxHalfExtents.getY(),0);
00094                 m_vertices[1].setValue(boxHalfExtents.getX(),-boxHalfExtents.getY(),0);
00095                 m_vertices[2].setValue(boxHalfExtents.getX(),boxHalfExtents.getY(),0);
00096                 m_vertices[3].setValue(-boxHalfExtents.getX(),boxHalfExtents.getY(),0);
00097 
00098                 m_normals[0].setValue(0,-1,0);
00099                 m_normals[1].setValue(1,0,0);
00100                 m_normals[2].setValue(0,1,0);
00101                 m_normals[3].setValue(-1,0,0);
00102 
00103                 btScalar minDimension = boxHalfExtents.getX();
00104                 if (minDimension>boxHalfExtents.getY())
00105                         minDimension = boxHalfExtents.getY();
00106 
00107                 m_shapeType = BOX_2D_SHAPE_PROXYTYPE;
00108                 btVector3 margin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00109                 m_implicitShapeDimensions = (boxHalfExtents * m_localScaling) - margin;
00110 
00111                 setSafeMargin(minDimension);
00112         };
00113 
00114         virtual void setMargin(btScalar collisionMargin)
00115         {
00116                 //correct the m_implicitShapeDimensions for the margin
00117                 btVector3 oldMargin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00118                 btVector3 implicitShapeDimensionsWithMargin = m_implicitShapeDimensions+oldMargin;
00119                 
00120                 btConvexInternalShape::setMargin(collisionMargin);
00121                 btVector3 newMargin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00122                 m_implicitShapeDimensions = implicitShapeDimensionsWithMargin - newMargin;
00123 
00124         }
00125         virtual void    setLocalScaling(const btVector3& scaling)
00126         {
00127                 btVector3 oldMargin(getMargin(),getMargin(),getMargin());
00128                 btVector3 implicitShapeDimensionsWithMargin = m_implicitShapeDimensions+oldMargin;
00129                 btVector3 unScaledImplicitShapeDimensionsWithMargin = implicitShapeDimensionsWithMargin / m_localScaling;
00130 
00131                 btConvexInternalShape::setLocalScaling(scaling);
00132 
00133                 m_implicitShapeDimensions = (unScaledImplicitShapeDimensionsWithMargin * m_localScaling) - oldMargin;
00134 
00135         }

00154                 return 4;

00173         virtual void getPlane(btVector3& planeNormal,btVector3& planeSupport,int i ) const
00174         {
00175                 //this plane might not be aligned...
00176                 btVector4 plane ;
00177                 getPlaneEquation(plane,i);
00178                 planeNormal = btVector3(plane.getX(),plane.getY(),plane.getZ());
00179                 planeSupport = localGetSupportingVertex(-planeNormal);
00180         }
00181

00183         const btVector3& getCentroid() const
00184         {
00185                 return m_centroid;
00186         }
00187         
00188         virtual int getNumPlanes() const
00189         {
00190                 return 6;
00191         }       
00192         
00193         
00194 
00195         virtual int getNumEdges() const
00196         {
00197                 return 12;
00198         }

00200 
00201         virtual void getVertex(int i,btVector3& vtx) const
00202         {
00203                 btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00204 
00205                 vtx = btVector3(
00206                                 halfExtents.x() * (1-(i&1)) - halfExtents.x() * (i&1),
00207                                 halfExtents.y() * (1-((i&2)>>1)) - halfExtents.y() * ((i&2)>>1),
00208                                 halfExtents.z() * (1-((i&4)>>2)) - halfExtents.z() * ((i&4)>>2));
00209         }
00210         
00211 
00212         virtual void    getPlaneEquation(btVector4& plane,int i) const
00213         {
00214                 btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00215 
00216                 switch (i)
00217                 {
00218                 case 0:
00219                         plane.setValue(btScalar(1.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),-halfExtents.x());
00220                         break;
00221                 case 1:
00222                         plane.setValue(btScalar(-1.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),-halfExtents.x());
00223                         break;
00224                 case 2:
00225                         plane.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(1.),btScalar(0.),-halfExtents.y());
00226                         break;
00227                 case 3:
00228                         plane.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(-1.),btScalar(0.),-halfExtents.y());
00229                         break;
00230                 case 4:
00231                         plane.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(1.),-halfExtents.z());
00232                         break;
00233                 case 5:
00234                         plane.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(-1.),-halfExtents.z());
00235                         break;
00236                 default:
00237                         btAssert(0);
00238                 }
00239         }
00240 
00241         
00242         virtual void getEdge(int i,btVector3& pa,btVector3& pb) const
00243         //virtual void getEdge(int i,Edge& edge) const
00244         {
00245                 int edgeVert0 = 0;
00246                 int edgeVert1 = 0;
00247 
00248                 switch (i)
00249                 {
00250                 case 0:
00251                                 edgeVert0 = 0;
00252                                 edgeVert1 = 1;
00253                         break;
00254                 case 1:
00255                                 edgeVert0 = 0;
00256                                 edgeVert1 = 2;
00257                         break;
00258                 case 2:
00259                         edgeVert0 = 1;
00260                         edgeVert1 = 3;
00261 
00262                         break;
00263                 case 3:
00264                         edgeVert0 = 2;
00265                         edgeVert1 = 3;
00266                         break;
00267                 case 4:
00268                         edgeVert0 = 0;
00269                         edgeVert1 = 4;
00270                         break;
00271                 case 5:
00272                         edgeVert0 = 1;
00273                         edgeVert1 = 5;
00274 
00275                         break;
00276                 case 6:
00277                         edgeVert0 = 2;
00278                         edgeVert1 = 6;
00279                         break;
00280                 case 7:
00281                         edgeVert0 = 3;
00282                         edgeVert1 = 7;
00283                         break;
00284                 case 8:
00285                         edgeVert0 = 4;
00286                         edgeVert1 = 5;
00287                         break;
00288                 case 9:
00289                         edgeVert0 = 4;
00290                         edgeVert1 = 6;
00291                         break;
00292                 case 10:
00293                         edgeVert0 = 5;
00294                         edgeVert1 = 7;
00295                         break;
00296                 case 11:
00297                         edgeVert0 = 6;
00298                         edgeVert1 = 7;
00299                         break;
00300                 default:
00301                         btAssert(0);
00302 
00303                 }
00304 
00305                 getVertex(edgeVert0,pa );
00306                 getVertex(edgeVert1,pb );
00307         }

00312         
00313         virtual bool isInside(const btVector3& pt,btScalar tolerance) const
00314         {
00315                 btVector3 halfExtents = getHalfExtentsWithoutMargin();
00316 
00317                 //btScalar minDist = 2*tolerance;
00318                 
00319                 bool result =   (pt.x() <= (halfExtents.x()+tolerance)) &&
00320                                                 (pt.x() >= (-halfExtents.x()-tolerance)) &&
00321                                                 (pt.y() <= (halfExtents.y()+tolerance)) &&
00322                                                 (pt.y() >= (-halfExtents.y()-tolerance)) &&
00323                                                 (pt.z() <= (halfExtents.z()+tolerance)) &&
00324                                                 (pt.z() >= (-halfExtents.z()-tolerance));
00325                 
00326                 return result;
00327         }

00336         virtual int             getNumPreferredPenetrationDirections() const
00337         {
00338                 return 6;
00339         }
00340         
00341         virtual void    getPreferredPenetrationDirection(int index, btVector3& penetrationVector) const
00342         {
00343                 switch (index)
00344                 {
00345                 case 0:
00346                         penetrationVector.setValue(btScalar(1.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.));
00347                         break;
00348                 case 1:
00349                         penetrationVector.setValue(btScalar(-1.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.));
00350                         break;
00351                 case 2:
00352                         penetrationVector.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(1.),btScalar(0.));
00353                         break;
00354                 case 3:
00355                         penetrationVector.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(-1.),btScalar(0.));
00356                         break;
00357                 case 4:
00358                         penetrationVector.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(1.));
00359                         break;
00360                 case 5:
00361                         penetrationVector.setValue(btScalar(0.),btScalar(0.),btScalar(-1.));
00362                         break;
00363                 default:
00364                         btAssert(0);
00365                 }
00366         }
